SELECT T.TEAM_NM, T.TEAM_NO, T.MEM_NO FROM TEAM T INNER JOIN MEM M ON T.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO WHERE TEAM_DEL = 1
AND TEAM_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
ORDER BY TEAM_NO DESC

SELECT T.TEAM_NM, T.TEAM_LOGO, S.SPORT_NM, T.TEAM_INTRO, T.MEM_NO FROM TEAM T INNER JOIN SPORT S ON T.SPORT_NO = S.SPORT_NO INNER JOIN MEM M ON T.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO WHERE TEAM_DEL = 1 AND TEAM_NO = #{tno}
